def count_unique_characters(string):
    string = string.replace(' ', '').lower()
    unique_chars = set(string)
    unique_count = len(unique_chars)
    print('')
    print('|--------------|-----------------------|')
    print(f'| {string} | {unique_count} |')
    return unique_count
